mediaGallery.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a Media Gallery

url.fieldDescription: Select the url of the media
url.name: ./url

media-type.fieldDescription: Select the type of the media
media-type.name: ./type

thumbnail-url.fieldDescription: Select the thumbnailUrl of the media
thumbnail-url.name: ./thumbnailUrl

small-image-url.fieldDescription: Select the smallImageUrl of the media
small-image-url.name: ./smallImageUrl

showViewAll.name: ./section/sectionHeader/showViewAll
showViewAll.fieldDescription: if view all should be shown

viewHistoryShow.name: ./section/sectionHeader/viewHistory/show
viewHistoryShow.fieldDescription: if view history should be shown

experience-warning.text: Experience filters should be filled only if experience type selected !

free-experience.name: ./section/auto/experience/freeOnly
free-experience.fieldDescription: if checked only free experiences will be retrieved
